short_summary: Request for wood chippers through competitive bidding
duration_in_months: It will be effectively from 2023-12-18 to 2024-03-15
full_summary:
=====================================================

## Self-Contained, Towable Industrial Wood Chipper Tender

**Tender Information**

* **Reference Number:** WS4259575538-Doc4281811937
* **Publication Date:** 2023-10-30
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-29T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-11-30

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS4259575538
* **Procurement Category:** Goods (GD)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding

## Contract Information

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-12-18
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-15
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:**
  * 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
  * Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
  * Canada

## Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit a proposal for one (1) self-contained, towable industrial wood chipper. The contract is expected to commence on 2023-12-18 and end on 2024-03-15.

**Note:** Amendment to Closing Time: All bids must be submitted by 2023-12-04 at 14:00 hours EST. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

## Contact Information

* **Purchaser:**
  * Hannah Jeong (SPAC/PSPC)
  * Phone: None
  * Email: <hannah.jeong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
  * Fax: None

## Bid Submission

Bidders must submit their proposal through Ariba Discovery at the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17855436?extsite=MTc4NTU0MzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

[TO BE CONTINUED]
